data.title: Lino's – Rockford’s destination Italian restaurant
data.meta_description: Lino’s is a 50-year-old, family-owned and operated Italian restaurant that’s renowned both for legendary pizza and delicious classic Italian cuisine. Visit our flagship location on State Street in Rockford or our casual, flexible outpost near the MercyHealth Sportscore Two complex in Loves Park.
data.text:
3000+ Google Reviews

ROckford’s Italian

Award-winning pizza that’s the stuff of Illinois legend.

Authentic fine Italian cuisine that’s the centerpiece of a perfect night out—or in.

World-class pizza and unbeatable Italian classics

A perfect setting for casual get-togethers and special occasions

Fine wines and killer gelato from a Rockford culinary institution

Original. Incomparable. Delicious.

Nothing compares to a Lino’s pizza. Here’s why:

Our special recipe, house-aged artisan cheese uses milk sourced from local Amish farms. We also make our Italian sausage in-house, as well as nearly all other ingredients.

It’s the Ingredients.

It’s the Crust.

Our dough and sauce are also house-made using delicious, generations-old family recipes.

It’s the Tradition.

People have been drooling over our pizza for over 50 years, including recent local and regional awards.

Everything Italian

We showcase the best of our culinary heritage, from fine wines to great steaks and amazing house-made gelato

Authentic and extraordinary classic Italian cuisine, from homemade pastas and steaks to favorites such as lasagna.

Italian

Classic Italian wines, from Tuscan Chiantis to Prosecco and Pinot Grigio from the country’s northern region, curated by our certified house sommelier.

Wine

Pick your favorite mouth-watering flavor of handmade gelato from our in-house gelateria, Gelato Joe’s.

Gelato

Two fabulous locations

East State & Riverside

Visit our famous flagship restaurant at 5611 East State Street in Rockford, dripping with old-school Italian character, or check out our newest location on East Riverside near I90 for a convenient take on Lino’s cuisine that’s just as delicious.

Lino’s on State

Our Flagship Restaurant

Full Menu, Gelato and Wine Program

Indoor/Outdoor Seating

LOCATION

5611 East State Street

Rockford, IL 61108

815-397-2077

HOURS

Sun–Thu: 4:30–9p

Fri–Sat: 4:30–10p

Lino’s on Riverside

Relaxed, Fun, Outdoor Seating

Near I90 and Sportscore Two

Core Menu, Select Wines and Gelato

LOCATION

8410 East Riverside

Loves Park, IL 61111

815-373-1610

HOURS

Sun: 10:30a–8p

Mon: Closed

Tue–Thu: 4:30–8p

Fri: 4:30–9p

Sat: 10:30a–9p

Share Lino’s

Trust Lino’s to ensure that your special events and gifts are truly special.

Make your next event sizzle with a meal from Lino’s—whether you prefer a simple drop-off or Lino’s award-winning, full-service catering.

Catering

Lino’s is proud to have hosted special events ranging from wedding receptions to birthday parties and class reunions throughout our 50 years. Make yours next!

Private Events

Gift Certificates

You love Lino’s—and so will your friends. Invite them to enjoy a relaxing, delicious night out with a gift certificate to Lino’s.

Upcoming Events

Live jazz every Tuesday and Thursday from 6 to 9 p.m. at our East State location.

Music

Enjoy the finest Italian wines as part of an extraordinary meal at our special, ticketed wine events—perhaps the best value in Rockford!

Wine Tastings

Community

Look for Lino’s at community events ranging from Rockford City Market to area concerts and festivals.

A 50-Year Legacy of Flavor and Family

The Battista Family started Lino’s in 1972 and runs it to this day, still relying on the dedication to exceptional ingredients, old-world techniques and innovative approaches that built and have sustained our legacy. At Lino’s, you can taste the love and tradition that go into every bite.

“One of the best meals my family has ever had. The service was amazing!”

JAMES S., YELP

“Lino’s is always so savory and flavorful. It’s … a frequent must-have.”

ASHLEY H., GOOGLE

“Pizza was so awesome...the restaurant is beautiful and the staff is beyond the greatest!”

KIMBERLY Z., GOOGLE

“All I have to say is awesome food reminds me of being with my family on Sunday dinner. Tastes like what my grandma used to make.”

JOE C., GOOGLE

Not Fussy,

Just Fabulous

Share a meal at Lino’s today

@linosrockford
